description:
A middle-aged man with a perpetual grin, he is http://anidb.net/ch11306 [Alpha]`s closest neighbor and a regular customer at her caf√©. He runs a gas station and sells vegetables on the side. He is a grandfather-figure to Alpha and the actual grandfather of http://anidb.net/ch11311 [Takahiro]. Ojisan refers to himself as a bum, and seems to regret not pursuing a relationship with http://anidb.net/ch11310 [doctor] when they were younger. His real name is never given.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ojisan
